content: AFAIK, the enum variant expression only differs from the struct expression in that you can't use .. (sidenote: also true for unions?). Wouldn't it make more sense to have those then be the same expression, with a semantic restriction that .. doesn't work for enums? Having an entirely second page for this feels off.
Yes, that looks incorrect. I'm not sure why it was done that way, but it should be changed. Do you want to fix it? :smile:
